meanings.definition: A person who imagines or forms mental images.
meanings.sent1: The imaginers in the story created a magical world in their minds.
meanings.sent2: The group of imaginers at the art class sketched their dream houses.
meanings.sent3: The imaginers at the party had fun guessing what the clouds looked like.
meanings.sent4: The imaginers in the theater painted vivid scenes with their thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The children were known as the best imaginers in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To form a mental image or concept of.
meanings.sent1: She imaginers a peaceful beach whenever she needs to relax.
meanings.sent2: He imaginers himself as a superhero when he plays with his toys.
meanings.sent3: The artist imaginers a world where animals can talk and dance.
meanings.sent4: The writer imaginers a future where robots do all the chores.
meanings.sent5: They imaginers a world full of laughter and kindness in their minds.
